brain-teens-1.title: Exercise Story
brain-teens-1.description: Learn how daily exercise benefits brain health

brain-teens-2.title: Quiz on Habits
brain-teens-2.description: Test your knowledge of brain-healthy habits

brain-teens-4.title: Puzzle: Brain Fuel
brain-teens-4.description: Match brain fuels with their sources or benefits

brain-teens-5.title: Junk Food Story
brain-teens-5.description: Learn how junk food affects brain function

brain-teens-6.title: Debate: Brain vs Body
brain-teens-6.description: Participate in a debate on brain vs body health

brain-teens-7.title: Journal of Brain Fitness
brain-teens-7.description: Reflect on daily brain fitness habits

brain-teens-8.title: Simulation: Daily Routine
brain-teens-8.description: Choose the best daily routine for brain health

brain-teens-9.title: Reflex Brain Boost
brain-teens-9.description: Tap for brain-boosting foods, avoid harmful ones

brain-teens-10.title: Badge: Brain Health Hero
brain-teens-10.description: Earn your badge for completing brain health practices

brain-teens-11.title: Exam Story
brain-teens-11.description: Learn how distractions affect exam performance

brain-teens-12.title: Quiz on Attention
brain-teens-12.description: Test your knowledge of attention boosters

brain-teens-14.title: Puzzle of Distractions
brain-teens-14.description: Match environments with their effects on focus

brain-teens-15.title: Social Media Story
brain-teens-15.description: Learn how social media affects focus

brain-teens-20.title: Badge: Focus Hero
brain-teens-20.description: Earn your badge for conquering distraction challenges

brain-teens-21.title: Exam Recall Story
brain-teens-21.description: Teen revises one night before. Memory strong? → No.

brain-teens-22.title: Quiz on Memory Hacks
brain-teens-22.description: Which helps memory? (a) Mnemonics, (b) Ignoring, (c) Skipping sleep). Correct = Mnemonics.

brain-teens-25.title: Note-taking Story
brain-teens-25.description: Teen takes notes in class. Does memory improve? → Yes.

brain-teens-26.title: Debate: Rote vs Understanding
brain-teens-26.description: Is rote learning better than understanding? → No, understanding is better.

brain-teens-27.title: Journal of Tricks
brain-teens-27.description: Write: 'One memory trick I use is ___.'

brain-teens-28.title: Simulation: Study Plan
brain-teens-28.description: Study 30 min daily or cram 3 hrs once? → Daily.

brain-teens-30.title: Badge: Memory Hero
brain-teens-30.description: Apply 5 memory boosters to earn your Memory Hero badge.

brain-teens-31.title: Study Pressure Story
brain-teens-31.description: Teen stressed before exam. Better choice? → Revise calmly.

brain-teens-32.title: Stress Quiz
brain-teens-32.description: What is a healthy stress reliever? (a) Exercise, (b) Overeating, (c) Yelling). Correct = Exercise.

brain-teens-34.title: Puzzle of Relief
brain-teens-34.description: Match 'Talk to Friend → Support' and 'Sleep → Refresh.'

brain-teens-35.title: Failure Story
brain-teens-35.description: Teen fails test. Should they give up? → No, try again.

brain-teens-36.title: Debate: Stress Good or Bad?
brain-teens-36.description: Can stress sometimes motivate us? → Yes, small stress helps, big stress harms.

brain-teens-37.title: Journal of Stress Relief
brain-teens-37.description: Write: 'One way I reduce stress is ___.'

brain-teens-38.title: Simulation: Stress Day
brain-teens-38.description: You feel stressed. Options: (a) Eat junk, (b) Sleep, (c) Walk & breathe. Correct = Walk & breathe.

brain-teens-40.title: Badge: Stress Manager
brain-teens-40.description: Beat 5 stress challenges to earn your Stress Manager badge.

brain-teens-41.title: Peer Pressure Story
brain-teens-41.description: Teen feels anxious when friends tease. Best step? → Stay calm & talk.

brain-teens-42.title: Emotion Quiz
brain-teens-42.description: What is empathy? (a) Feeling others' feelings, (b) Ignoring them). Correct = Feeling others' feelings.

brain-teens-44.title: Puzzle: Emotion Match
brain-teens-44.description: Match 'Fear → Heart Racing' and 'Calm → Deep Breathing.'

brain-teens-45.title: Anger Story
brain-teens-45.description: Teen argues with sibling. Best action? → Take break, then talk.

brain-teens-46.title: Debate: Show or Hide Emotions?
brain-teens-46.description: Should we always hide emotions? → No, express healthy.

brain-teens-47.title: Journal of Emotional Moment
brain-teens-47.description: Write: 'A time I controlled anger was ___.'

brain-teens-48.title: Simulation: Stressful Day
brain-teens-48.description: Options: (a) Bottle feelings, (b) Shout, (c) Journal/talk. Correct = Journal/talk.

brain-teens-50.title: Badge: Emotion Hero
brain-teens-50.description: Handle 5 emotional scenarios positively to earn your Emotion Hero badge.

brain-teens-51.title: Failure Story
brain-teens-51.description: Teen fails in test. Best response? → Learn from mistakes.

brain-teens-52.title: Positivity Quiz
brain-teens-52.description: Which is positive? (a) 'I'll try again,' (b) 'I'm useless.' Correct = 'I'll try again.'

brain-teens-55.title: Friend Betrayal Story
brain-teens-55.description: Teen feels hurt. Positive action? → Forgive and move on.

brain-teens-56.title: Debate: Optimism vs Realism
brain-teens-56.description: Is it better to be optimistic or realistic? → Balanced optimism.

brain-teens-58.title: Simulation: Negative Day
brain-teens-58.description: Bad day at school. Choices: (a) Stay upset, (b) Think of positives, (c) Quit tasks. Correct = Think of positives.

brain-teens-60.title: Badge: Optimist Hero
brain-teens-60.description: Show positive thinking in 5 cases to earn your Optimist Hero badge.

brain-teens-61.title: Sleep Story
brain-teens-61.description: Teen sleeps 5 hrs before exam, feels tired. Is this good? → No.

brain-teens-62.title: Sleep Quiz
brain-teens-62.description: How many hours should teens sleep? (a) 5, (b) 6–8, (c) 12). Correct = 6–8.

brain-teens-64.title: Puzzle of Sleep Health
brain-teens-64.description: Match 'Screen Off → Good Sleep, Noise → Bad Sleep.'

brain-teens-65.title: Phone Story
brain-teens-65.description: Teen uses phone till 2 AM, sleeps in class. Is this healthy? → No.

brain-teens-66.title: Debate: Sleep vs Study
brain-teens-66.description: Is it better to sleep or study late? → Balanced, sleep first.

brain-teens-67.title: Journal of Sleep Health
brain-teens-67.description: Write: 'One bedtime rule I follow is ___.'

brain-teens-68.title: Simulation: Exam Prep
brain-teens-68.description: Choices: (a) Study till 3 AM, (b) Sleep 8 hrs + study next day. Correct = Sleep + study.

brain-teens-70.title: Badge: Rest Hero
brain-teens-70.description: Manage 5 sleep challenges to earn your Rest Hero badge.

brain-teens-71.title: Midnight Story
brain-teens-71.description: Teen scrolls till 1 AM, tired next day. Smart? → No.

brain-teens-72.title: Quiz on Digital Balance
brain-teens-72.description: What is digital detox? (a) Time without gadgets, (b) More gadgets). Correct = Time without gadgets.

brain-teens-73.title: Reflex Tech Control
brain-teens-73.description: Tap for 'Switch Off at Night,' for 'Always On.'

brain-teens-74.title: Puzzle of Balance Habits
brain-teens-74.description: Match 'Sleep Early → Healthy, Midnight Phone → Tired.'

brain-teens-75.title: Gaming Story
brain-teens-75.description: Teen plays 6 hrs games daily, fails test. Healthy? → No.

brain-teens-76.title: Debate: Tech Good or Bad?
brain-teens-76.description: Is technology harmful? → No, harmful only if overused.

brain-teens-77.title: Journal of Balance
brain-teens-77.description: Write: 'One way I control screen time is ___.'

brain-teens-78.title: Simulation: Daily Routine
brain-teens-78.description: 4 hrs free. Choices: (a) All screen, (b) Sports + study + 1 hr screen. Correct = Balance.

brain-teens-79.title: Reflex Healthy Use
brain-teens-79.description: Tap for 'Digital Detox,' for 'Screen All Day.'

brain-teens-80.title: Badge: Digital Hero
brain-teens-80.description: Complete 5 digital balance challenges to earn your Digital Hero badge.

brain-teens-81.title: Science Project Story
brain-teens-81.description: Teen's project fails. What should they do? → Improve & retry.

brain-teens-82.title: Quiz on Innovation
brain-teens-82.description: Who is an innovator? (a) Creates new ideas, (b) Copies, (c) Quits). Correct = Creates new ideas.

brain-teens-83.title: Reflex Solution Mode
brain-teens-83.description: Tap quickly for Find Solution not Complain.

brain-teens-85.title: Startup Idea Story
brain-teens-85.description: Teen designs eco-bag. Is that good innovation? → Yes.

brain-teens-86.title: Debate: Copy vs Create
brain-teens-86.description: Is it better to copy success or create new? → Create new.

brain-teens-87.title: Journal of Creativity
brain-teens-87.description: Write: 'One creative idea I had was ___.'

brain-teens-88.title: Simulation: School Fair
brain-teens-88.description: Budget ₹500. Choose: (a) Copy poster, (b) Build model. Best = Build model.

brain-teens-90.title: Badge: Innovator Hero
brain-teens-90.description: Complete 5 creative problem-solving challenges to earn your Innovator Hero badge.

brain-teens-91.title: Exam Failure Story
brain-teens-91.description: Teen fails exam. Best choice? → Learn mistakes, try again.

brain-teens-92.title: Growth Mindset Quiz
brain-teens-92.description: Which is growth mindset? (a) I can't do it, (b) I'll improve. Correct = I'll improve.

brain-teens-93.title: Reflex Growth Attitude
brain-teens-93.description: Tap quickly for Practice More not Give Up.

brain-teens-94.title: Puzzle of Growth
brain-teens-94.description: Match: Effort → Success, Giving Up → Failure.

brain-teens-95.title: Career Story
brain-teens-95.description: Teen struggles in coding. Best path? → Practice until better.

brain-teens-96.title: Debate: Talent vs Effort
brain-teens-96.description: What matters more for success — talent or effort? → Effort.

brain-teens-97.title: Journal of Growth
brain-teens-97.description: Write: One skill I improved with practice was ___.

brain-teens-98.title: Simulation: Life Choices
brain-teens-98.description: Fail in sports selection. Options: (a) Quit, (b) Practice harder. Correct = Practice harder.

brain-teens-99.title: Reflex Never Quit
brain-teens-99.description: Tap for Keep Going not Stop Forever.

brain-teens-100.title: Badge: Growth Champion
brain-teens-100.description: Pass 5 growth mindset scenarios to earn your Growth Champion badge.
